description: Learn the fundamentals of Kata training. This class contains an intersting brief history of our lineage. This introductory free class can give you the gist of what we are about
We will teach you all the basic moves of karate to a degree where you can apply it for self defence in case you are attacked. Not only kicking and punching but intermidiate techniques can be learnt

Karate is a life long endevour. But it doesnt take forever to become a deadly fighter. We will teach you advanced techniques of karate to face any situation. Be fearless and unstoppable by taking our course
Not interested to fight and Interested only in fitness? We have you covered in this class we will train you to train your body to be fit as a fiddle. Cardiovascular fitness is key to long life
Karate is a lifetime endevour to continously better yourself. here is where you truly commit and see the benefits be part of our Dojo and community

Girls of modern era needs to be well eqiupted to deal with any situation. We will teach you to handle eveything from a mugger to a casual eve teaser. Lets have the confidence to take our evening walks in peace

Karate is a great way to teach kids how to be respectful and to focus on defense rather than offense. Using defensive and counterattacking body movements, kids will learn to honor their opponents and develop their character at the same time
80% of the time evey street fight ends up on the ground. We can teach you ground techniques to get out of any situation if you get pinned down on the streets of Dhaka
